definition[0]: the names of people, organizations etc that a person or group plans to harm
example[0]: He was on a terrorist’s hit list.
example[1]: The company drew up a hit list of shops it expects to close.
definition[1]: a list of organizations, people etc against which someone is planning to take action
example[2]: Most companies, even small ones, have middle managers on their hit lists.
example[3]: Alcohol and tobacco are at the top of the tax hit list.
